name: Death Is Progress
description:
- This Game was created with Latin Engine a custom game Engine developed by alabdaly -

Death Is Progress, In your death you're helping by making the future better for the next generation, it will be painful for you, but things require sacrifices

- Control -

R: Restart level

Space: Suicide is badass

ESC: Exit Game

A/D: Movement left and right

W: Jump

Q/E: Change the Death leftovers type
